title: Certification of safety and health professionals
context: [ยง396-4.5] Certification of safety and health professionals. (a) Only individuals receiving certification from the department as safety and health professionals shall be qualified to certify that an employer: (1) Has an effective safety and health program; and (2) Qualifies for a reduction in workers&rsquo; compensation insurance premiums under section 431:14-103(b). (b) Certification as a safety and health professional shall be: (1) Issued to an individual only; and (2) Renewable. &copy; Certificates issued under this section may be revoked or suspended by the director on any grounds specified in rules adopted under this chapter.
